body_html:
Seems like /EHa would be preferred, but would need to test the build. Not sure exactly if ehsc or eha is going to be better. I can try locally, but not sure I'll see the same errors as CI.

That warning is actually given for almost anything, so maybe just need to add that to CXX for everybody.

body:
Seems like /EHa would be preferred, but would need to test the build. Not sure exactly if ehsc or eha is going to be better. I can try locally, but not sure I'll see the same errors as CI.

That warning is actually given for almost anything, so maybe just need to add that to CXX for everybody.
